name: Angeli Wickrama Arachchige
bio: A second-year student with experience in MERN stack development. Currently working on Yakadabadu.lk, a scrap collection and recycling management system, and aspiring to specialize in Data Science as part of a BSc (Hons) in Information Technology. 🚀📚

projects.title: Yakadabadu.lk
projects.description: MERN-stack web platform for scrap collection, recycling, and resale. Features include pickup scheduling, driver management, and admin reports. ♻️📦

projects.title: Open-Source Portfolio
projects.description: A fully customizable and responsive portfolio template with sections for About, Projects, Skills, and Contact. Features easy customization via a JSON config file. 💻📄

projects.title: Inventory Management System
projects.description: A Java-based inventory management system for tracking stock levels and orders, including a Java Servlet SignUpHandler for user registration and email verification. 📦📈

projects.title: FashionStore
projects.description: A simple e-commerce website showcasing fashion items, built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. 👗🛍️
